member.name: IUIAnimationTransition.GetDuration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the transition.
member.param: The duration of the transition, in seconds.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

listheader.description: The requested value for the duration cannot be determined.
The storyboard for this transition is currently in the schedule.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition.IsDurationKnown
member.summary: Determines whether a transition's duration is currently known.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if the duration is known, S_FALSE if the duration is not known, or an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

listheader.description: The storyboard for this transition is currently in schedule.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition.SetInitialValue
member.summary: Sets the initial value for the transition.
member.param: The initial value for the transition.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition.SetInitialVelocity
member.summary: Sets the initial velocity for the transition.
member.param: The initial velocity for the transition.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition
member.summary: Defines a transition, which determines how an animation variable changes over time.
